name: landingpage-guide
description: Guide to Using the Hugo Landing Page Theme

scripts.gh: hugo -b https://dkebler.github.io/landingpage-guide -d gh && node ghpages && rm -rf gh
scripts.fbd: hugo -b https://landingpage-guide.firebaseapp.com -d firebase && ./node_modules/.bin/firebase deploy&& rm -rf firebase

author: David Kebler
